messages.content: Yeah after I showed it to my friend a few minutes later I realized what he meant but I forgot to remove my post.
Like I said previously I realise they weren't commonly called asylum seekers until recently. However that doesn't mean that previously they weren't asylum seekers
Oh, I realized that moments after rolling down my window, when his hand came through the space.
Huh... I'm left handed and have never realised I do this.
I've realized after more than 100 hours that you can dismount a horse without jumping off
just realized the pic is unrelated kinda, whatever though. proud of me despite my anxiety about puttin myself or there
My mom sent it to me so I knew it was bad but I didn’t realise it was already here
Then you get home and realise they managed to bill you for the booze. That's half your winnings gone.
Or just spend ten seconds around some fire and realize that it's super hot.
Wondered 'why doesn't it seem like theyre making any progress' before I realized how short the loop was....
I never even knew there were bullies in school unit I was out of school and read about bullies in school.
Alright OP here, I'm an [NAME] and this is not even close to how coupons work here. Didn't realise you [NAME] had such extreme coupons
I saw gluten free cat grass at the pet supplies store once. Did not know that was a thing
Yeah, that one. I forgot the name earlier.
I didn't know this was a "reveal" he'd been talking about for awhile.
I came here once accidentally, saw your commend and now, 2 weeks later, I totally understand.
That was my mistake. It should only show your First Name and The 1st letter of my last name.
"I have been abusive." This was before I even realised his narcissistic characteristics.
Please correct me if I'm wrong, but I thought that the name changes had more to do with legal issues then geographical ones.
I thought my [RELIGION] boarding school was weird but now it seems pretty tame and mild in comparison.
This reminds me of when it came out that the Hello Kitty! character is actually a human girl.
Some great advice right here!!!!!! I forgot about this
A crossover I never knew I needed
My dad also told me the car went underwater the first time we went to the Eastern Shore and I completely forgot about it until I read this comment.
oh man. it took me so long to figure out what you are saying. its literally [NAME]
I have crowns and I thought I needed a mouth guard but it seems like I don’t anymore.
I just rewatched season 5. My god, I had forgotten how horrible [NAME] is.
I remember running into teachers at the grocery store or whatever when I was a little kid and having that same feeling!
You're right. Respect and honesty has never changed for me, though I realize that's naive
It'll get you 9125 CENTS. Poor soul multiplied 365 by 25 without realizing the mistake
You're right, I completely forgot the title
That was my first thought too 😂
